definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)
Dali Bai autonomous prefecture in Yunnan
pinyin: Da4 li3 Bai2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1

definition: Lanping Bai and Pumi autonomous county in Nujiang Lisu autonomous prefecture 怒江傈僳族自治州[Nu4 jiang1 Li4 su4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1] in northwest Yunnan
pinyin: Lan2 ping2 Bai2 zu2 Pu3 mi3 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4
containing_words.word: 蘭坪白族普米族自治縣

sentences.english: Among ethnic groups, Bai , Bouyei and Miao people are also adept at embroidery.
sentences.chinese: 在民族，白族，布依族和苗族人還善於刺繡。

sentences.english: Dragon is one of the most sacred figures in ancient folk tales of the Bai People.
sentences.chinese: 龍是古代白族民間傳說中最受崇拜的神靈之一。

sentences.english: The Ming-Qing Period is a critical transitional period of Bai culture.
sentences.chinese: 明清時期，是白族文化發生重大轉型的關鍵時期。

sentences.english: Bai people speak Bai language in everyday life but use Han language(Chinese) as a written form.
sentences.chinese: 白族在日常生活中說白語，但使用漢語作爲書面語言。

sentences.english: The local Bai ethnic group regard the spring a symbol of eternal and faithful love.
sentences.chinese: 白族人心中的蝴蝶泉是忠貞愛情的象徵。

sentences.english: The Bai zest for business in even more obvious at the great market day scenes in Dali, Wase and Shaping.
sentences.chinese: 到了趕集的日子，白族風味的商業氣息更加濃烈。

sentences.english: It was taken over by Bai officials and renamed the Kingdom of Dali.
sentences.chinese: 白族軍官接管了這裏，將王國命名爲大理國。

sentences.english: The folk custom activities have cultivated all outstanding Suona entertainers of Bai Minority.
sentences.chinese: 民俗活動培育了歷代優秀的白族嗩吶藝人。

sentences.english: Most children of Bai people begin to learn singing at the age of four or five, which has a special enlightening education.
sentences.chinese: 許多白族的孩子從小學歌，是一種特殊的啓蒙教育。

sentences.english: It's a Bai ethnic tea tradition.
sentences.chinese: 三道茶是白族的一種飲茶習俗。

sentences.english: The Bai nationality, deeply affected by the Han nationality in many ways, knows the importance of education and does well in commerce.
sentences.chinese: 在社會文化習俗方面，元江白族受漢族的影響很深。

sentences.english: Located in Dali prefecture, Taihe Village is an ancient village of the Bai people with a long history of more than a thousand years.
sentences.chinese: 大理市的太和村，是一個具有千餘年曆史的白族古村。

sentences.english: Yang Fu was a noted Bai scholar of Dali, who once wrote Shanhua Stele in Bai language.
sentences.chinese: 楊黼是大理著名的白族學者，著有白文《山花碑》。

definition: Hmong or Miao ethnic group of southwest China
Blang people, one of the 56 ethnic groups officially recognized by the PRC
Jingpo ethnic group of Tibet and Yunnan
Zhuang ethnic group of Guangxi, the PRC's second most numerous ethnic group
Wa, Kawa or Va ethnic group of Myanmar, south China and southeast Asia
Mosuo ethnic group of Yunnan and Sichuan
